projects.Title: Coffee Table
projects.Description_short: Hand made live edge river table
projects.Description:
This table was a fun project made from catalpa wood with blue slate glass cut to fit to the shape of the live edge. The legs are welded together and bolted to the underside of the slab.

about_me: I enjoy using my hands and mind to imagine and create. I am a student halfway through obtaining a degree in mechanical engineering. When I am not busy with school I am working on a variety of projects. Each project is related to some or all of the following goals of; pleasing the eye, inducing an unbelievable thrill, providing a place to rest my feet, or producing energy.
contact_me: If you are interested by the things you see please let me know. I am happy to hear from you and always open to working on custom projects or selling existing projects
